text: Onsi Sawiris (also written Sawires, , ; August 14, 1930 - June 29, 2021) was an Egyptian businessman. His net worth is $1.2 billion according to Forbes in 2017.Onsi Sawiris â€“ Forbes Forbes. Retrieved May 11, 2011. He was the head of the Sawiris family. He founded the Orascom conglomerate. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:1930 births Category:Egyptian businesspeople
